definition: (of a sum of money etc) receivable
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: If any debt becomes overdue, inform the branch head immediately.
sentences.chinese: 如遇應收賬款逾期未到帳，立即告知知分公司總經理。

sentences.english: But many companies go broke because of bad receivables.
sentences.chinese: 但是許多公司因爲壞的應收賬款而破產。

sentences.english: In the mean while, it shall write off the amount of the relevant receivable reinsurance reserve.
sentences.chinese: 同時，轉銷相關應收分保準備金餘額。

sentences.english: Moreover, the author insists that the quality of toll right is collective receivable account.
sentences.chinese: 此外，筆者認爲收費權性質上爲將來集合應收賬款。

sentences.english: Bad information about bills can also lead collectors into problems.
sentences.chinese: 應收債務相關信息的不準確也會給催收公司帶來問題。

sentences.english: The main part of the enterprise's accounts is accounts receivable and accounts payable.
sentences.chinese: 企業往來款的主要部分爲應收賬款和應付賬款。

sentences.english: The carrying amounts of the Foundation's other receivables are denominated in Hong Kong dollars.
sentences.chinese: 本基金其他應收款的賬面值以港元單位。

sentences.english: Accounts Receivable are often classified as current assets.
sentences.chinese: 應收帳款通常歸入流動資產。

sentences.english: To follow up and take action on overdue trade debts.
sentences.chinese: 應收賬超期超額的跟進及採取行動。

sentences.english: Check account with the financial department and control the arrearage .
sentences.chinese: 與財務部門帳目覈對及應收欠款的控制。

sentences.english: Receivables and prepayments shall be accounted for according to actual amount.
sentences.chinese: 應收及預支款項理賣按實踐發生額記帳。

sentences.english: Direct post or transfer transaction to account receivable.
sentences.chinese: 可直接從前臺入帳或掛帳至應收帳。

sentences.english: "The property law" regulates that account receivable can be pledged.
sentences.chinese: 《物權法》明確規定，應收賬款可以出質。

sentences.english: The import factor will handle your collection after sales.
sentences.chinese: 進口保理商將在出貨後處理你的應收款。

sentences.english: There is no withholding tax payable on dividend distribution.
sentences.chinese: 對紅利分配不徵收應收預扣稅款。

definition: remittance/funds paid to a bank account
to claim a credit against/tax reduction
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
debt security/collateralized debt obligation (CDO), type of bond
